snippet.title: Dead of Darkness  - Gameplay Trailer (Survival Horror Action Adventure)
snippet.description:
Wishlist Dead of Darkness on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2157210?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=trailer

Dead of Darkness is a 2D survival-horror action-adventure. Investigate a missing persons case on Velvet Island and unravel its disturbing secret. You’ll have to face grotesque creatures, hurdle deadly traps, solve puzzles, and most importantly, survive.
